revision.text: ==Classical Nahuatl== ===Etymology=== From {{suffix|nci|xihxicuin|yōtl|t1=glutton}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|nci|/ʃiʔʃikʷinjoːtɬ/}} ===Noun=== {{head|nci|noun|head=xihxicuinyōtl}} # [[gluttony|Gluttony]]. ===References=== * Karttunen, Frances. (1983) ''An Analytical Dictionary of Nahuatl'', University of Texas Press, p. 324. * Lockhart, James. (2001) ''Nahuatl as Written'', Stanford University Press, p. 241.
